prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Strings, Synth Lead, Guitar, Piano, Drums, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Strings, a Synth Lead, a Guitar, Piano, Drums - but no Bass.

Style 2:

Style 3:
